function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vector control tools implemented for malaria","Impact":"Exacerbated malaria problem due to creation of artificial lakes","Mitigation":"Regulation of water levels in lakes, shoreline improvements such as deepening or diking and draining, larviciding, house screening, and DDT spraying","Technologies":"Larvicides, house screening, DDT spraying","People":"Population in the region","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Outbreaks of yellow fever and malaria taking the lives of US soldiers in Cuba","Impact":"High mortality among US soldiers","Mitigation":"House inspections, oiling or destruction of mosquito-producing containers, isolation of yellow fever patients in screened quarters, fumigation of premises, and fines for non-compliance","Technologies":"House inspections, fumigation, fines","People":"US soldiers, residents of Cuba","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
